#summary instructions to install Glare-DataServices
= Introduction =
The Glare-!DataServices source is available as a bundle in the Cincom Public Store Repository. You need to connect to this repository to load the bundle and its dependencies.

= Details =
  * [http://www.cincomsmalltalk.com/CincomSmalltalkWiki/PostgreSQL+Access+Page Connect] to the Cincom Public Store Repository
  * Open the list of Published Items
  * Select and load bundle *!GlareDataServices*
